attributes.action: Invest more money in Fuel Cell R&D, including a roll out of hydrogen pump facilities at petrol stations throughout the UK please thankyou
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Automotive Fuel Cell technology will never get off the ground in this country if there isn't the necessary infrastructure to support it. Ever-decreasing finite supplies of coal, gas and oil means the need to comprehensively concentrate on new forms of SUSTAINABLE energies is paramount. Every day we lose puts us one step closer to collapse.
